entries.journal_entry_description: A strange transmission was intercepted by a communications tech at Nova Orion Station. The source is unknown, but the message implied that someone had been manipulating recent events between Jonas Nova and Garrick Orion for their own personal gain. You have been asked to find the source of the transmission and learn more.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Track down the source of the transmission.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Return to Garrick Orion on Nova Orion Station.
